statements: SELECT artifact_name, artifact_description FROM historical_artifacts
SELECT * FROM historical_artifacts
SELECT artifact_name, artifact_origin, location_description FROM historical_artifacts
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, artifact_description FROM historical_artifacts ORDER BY artifact_name DESC
SELECT artifact_name, artifact_description FROM historical_artifacts WHERE location_id = '12345'
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, artifact_description FROM historical_artifacts WHERE artifact_origin = 'Rome' ORDER BY artifact_name DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_artifacts WHERE location_description LIKE '%ruins%' AND artifact_origin = 'Egypt' ORDER BY location_description ASC
SELECT artifact_name, location_description FROM historical_artifacts WHERE location_id = '123-456-789' OR location_id = '987-654-321'

SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, artifact_description, location_description FROM historical_artifacts WHERE artifact_origin <> 'China' AND location_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY artifact_name ASC, location_description DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location_id) AS total_locations, artifact_origin FROM historical_artifacts GROUP BY artifact_origin HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT location_id) >= 3 ORDER BY total_locations DESC, artifact_origin ASC
SELECT * FROM artifacts;
SELECT name, description FROM artifacts WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE acquisition_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT description, name FROM artifacts WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT artifact_id, name, location_id FROM artifacts WHERE acquisition_date <= '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT artifact_id, name, description FROM artifacts WHERE floor = 2;
SELECT name, location_id, acquisition_date FROM artifacts WHERE floor = 3 AND location_id = 4;
SELECT artifact_id, name, room_description FROM artifacts, locations WHERE artifacts.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM artifacts ORDER BY room_number, floor DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_artifacts
SELECT artifact_name, arrival_date FROM historical_artifacts WHERE location_id = 2
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'Rome'
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, arrival_date FROM historical_artifacts ORDER BY arrival_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_artifacts FROM historical_artifacts
SELECT artifact_name, location_id FROM historical_artifacts WHERE arrival_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT artifact_name, location_id, arrival_date FROM historical_artifacts WHERE location_id = 5 ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, location_name, city, country FROM historical_artifacts JOIN locations ON historical_artifacts.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE city = 'Paris';
SELECT artifact_name, location_name, movement_date FROM historical_artifacts JOIN artifact_history ON historical_artifacts.artifact_id = artifact_history.artifact_id ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_artifacts WHERE artifact_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT * FROM artifacts;
SELECT name, description FROM artifacts;
SELECT artifact_id, name FROM artifacts WHERE artifact_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM artifact_locations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM artifacts;
SELECT artifact_id, name FROM artifacts ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT a.name, a.description, l.name AS location_name FROM artifacts AS a INNER JOIN artifact_locations AS al ON a.artifact_id = al.artifact_id INNER JOIN locations AS l ON al.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT ac.category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artifacts FROM artifacts_categories AS ac INNER JOIN artifacts AS a ON ac.artifact_id = a.artifact_id GROUP BY ac.category_name;

SELECT a.name, l.name AS location_name, al.start_date, al.end_date FROM artifacts AS a INNER JOIN artifact_locations AS al ON a.artifact_id = al.artifact_id INNER JOIN locations AS l ON al.location_id = l.location_id WHERE al.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM artifacts;
SELECT artifact_name, description, origin_country FROM artifacts;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE building_name = 'Museum Building';
SELECT artifact_name, origin_country FROM artifacts WHERE acquisition_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT curator_name, department, contact_email FROM curator;
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE origin_country = 'USA';
SELECT artifact_name, description FROM artifacts WHERE acquisition_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT location_name, room_number, building_name FROM locations WHERE floor_number = 3;
SELECT curator_name, department FROM curator WHERE contact_email LIKE '%example.com%';

SELECT artifact_name, movement_date, movement_reason FROM artifacts JOIN artifact_history ON artifacts.artifact_id = artifact_history.artifact_id WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
